fontus module¶

This module contains the classes fontus, stations, parameters and plotting

class fontus.Filter(parent, df_fields: pandas.core.frame.DataFrame)[source]¶

Bases: object

This class holds all filter control filter_stations_cb if set, selected station attributes are shown to build a station filter station_list a station multi list allowing to select multiple stations station_list filter_by_year_cb filter_year_slider filter_season_list x_list x parameter x_list y parameter

class FilterItem(parent, row)[source]¶

Bases: object

Filter item is used to dynamically generate UI station and parameter filter controls values are stored in table list_field.

append_parameter_filter(criteria)[source]¶

Appends a filter for x and y parameters for plots.

Parameters

criteria – where clause for sql statement

Return result

initial criteria with additional filter for x and y parameter for scatter plots and y parameter only for most other plot types

fill_controls()[source]¶

Fills the dictionary __station_fields_multilist with all filter options for each menu item.

property get_expression¶

Returns a filter expression depending on the menu context.

render_menu()[source]¶

Renders the filter menu. The filters_multilist is a list of filter objects read from the database each having a labal, default values und an options list, including all distinct values that should appear in the options list in the select box control for this filter.

property station_fields_multilist¶

Returns the dictionary of filter controls for station filters. For example if the user selects aquifer and county from the list of available filterable fields, then two select boxes are shown to the user.

class fontus.Fontus[source]¶

Bases: object

This class holds data on: - the database connection - the available data collection in the database - the current data collection - the available datasets in the current data collectin - the current dataset

property curr_data_collection¶

Data frame holding current data collection record

property data_collection_display¶
property data_collection_id¶
property data_collection_options¶

List of ids from data_collection table. the list is used to fill the data collection selection control

property data_type¶

Returns data type for selected dataset: 1: chemistry 2: precipitation 3: water levels

property dataset_display¶

dictionary of dataset id:name pairs for current data collection

property dataset_id¶

returns the dataset_id

property dataset_options¶

List of ids from dataset table. the list is used to fill the dataset selection control

property dfAll_data_collections¶

data frame holding all available data collection in the database

property filter¶

Object holding all filter settings

property first_year¶

Year of first sample collection

get_values(criteria)[source]¶

Returns a data frame with all values matching the criteria

property google_maps_url¶
has_google_maps_url()[source]¶
property has_markers¶

If True data points in plots will be shown as circles

property last_year¶

Year of most recent sample collection

property menu¶

menu selection: info, plotting, parameters info, stations info

property observations_view¶

return view name for observations of the selected dataset

property parameter_view¶

return view name for the parameters tble of the selected dataset

property parameters¶

Parameters object associated with current data collection

property plots¶

Returns a plots objects which is used to render plots and plots related UI controls :return:

render_about_text()[source]¶

Renders info on the selected data collection composed of: a header image, some explenatory text, a metadatatable for the data collection and metadata for each dataset included in the data collection

render_help()[source]¶

Renders a help icon linking to the <read the docs> user manual

show_url_list()[source]¶

In table refererence url references realted to each data collection can be defined and rendered with this function

property station_main_display_view¶

sql string querying columns for station display view, menu item stations info

property station_samples_display_view¶

sql string querying columns for station display view, menu item stations info

property station_years_display_view¶

sql string querying columns for station display view, menu item stations info

property stations¶

Stations object associated with current data collection

class fontus.Parameters(parent)[source]¶

Bases: object

property dfParameters¶
get_map_table(parameter)[source]¶

bla

get_parameter_summary_table(criteria)[source]¶

returns a DataFrame holding summary values for samples matching the specified in: criteria: where clause of sql statement

out DataFrame with summary information on parameter and station

get_parameter_table(criteria)[source]¶

returns a DataFrame holding summary values for samples matching the specified in: criteria: where clause of sql statement

out DataFrame with summary information on parameter and station

get_value(parameter, field)[source]¶

Returns a metadata value from the parameter table for a specified parameter in: parameter id

field name

out: metadata value for parameter id

property parameters_display¶
property parameters_options¶
property parent¶
refresh_options(criteria)[source]¶

generates the list of parameters. if a criteria is specified, only parameters matching the criteria are used in the list.

render_all_parameters_table()[source]¶

This function is invoked, if no parameter filter is set. A single table including the metadata of all parameters is shown in the view panel

render_menu()[source]¶

The function renders the sidebar menu for the parameters option menu item

render_multi_parameters_table(lis_par)[source]¶

This function is invoked, if the parameter filter is set and multiple parameters are selected. The following tables are shown: * parameters metadata * parameter value summary per station

render_single_parameters_table(lis)[source]¶

This function is invoked, if the parameter filter is set and multiple parameters are selected. The following tables are shown: * parameters metadata * parameter value summary per station * a map

class fontus.Plots(parent)[source]¶

Bases: object

This class is used to generate plots and render plot related UI controls

creates the sql where clause for the set filter controls

static plot_map(title: str, df: pandas.core.frame.DataFrame, layer_type: str = 'HexagonLayer') → list[source]¶

Generates a map plot

Parameters

  • layer_type – HexagonLayer or ScatterplotLayer

  • title – title of plot

  • df – dataframe with data to be plotted

Returns

class fontus.Stations(parent)[source]¶

Bases: object

Holds all information on the stations related to the current dataset

draw_map(station_name, criteria)[source]¶

Draws a map of all selected stations. If no filter is set, all stations are shown.

get_samples(sqlstr, criteria)[source]¶

Returns a DataFrame of samples as a DataFrame where column 0 is the field name and column 1 is its value

get_table(criteria)[source]¶

Returns the metadata for all stations, if no station is selected, or the selected stations. :param criteria: :return: table as DataFrame

get_values(criteria)[source]¶

Returns a data frame with all values matching the criteria

get_yearly_sample_summary_table(criteria)[source]¶

Returns a DataFrame with 1 record for every year when samples were collected

refresh_options(criteria)[source]¶

Generates the list of stations. if a criteria is specified, only stations matching the criteria are used in the list. :param criteria: sql where clause

render_menu()[source]¶

Renders the station info menu controls and calls the procedures to show tables and a map for all or the selected stations.
